fields.text: Welcome to Discord Support in San Francisco, your connection to crystal clear voice and text chat.
Press [INDEX] for account and billing inquiries.
Press [INDEX] for technical support and troubleshooting.
Press [INDEX] for account setup and login assistance.
Press [INDEX] for billing and subscription questions.
Press [INDEX] for voice chat quality and connectivity issues.
Press [INDEX] for mobile and desktop app support.
Please hold while we connect you to an account specialist.
Please hold while we connect you to a billing specialist.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support agent.
Please hold while we connect you to an app support specialist.
